page.title: 08LOCAL NEWS
page.content:
A local resident who has done a lot for the area has been appointed as a member of Countryside Commission for England and Wales. She has been the vice chairman of the local Countryside Commission for fifteen years. Her name is Mrs Gwyneth Davies who lives at Erw Bach, Halkyn.
Rhosesmor village becomes part of the Community of Halkyn. This means that Rhosesmor, which was in the Northop Community council, joins the other villages of Halkyn, Berth Ddu and Pentre Halkyn.
There will be a Rose Queen carnival in Rhosesmor. This is a competition for choosing a Carnival Queen from amoung lots of girls under eleven years of age. There are shows and games, all held at Rhosesmor in July.
